Jordan Brock

The Bourne Ultimatum

Sep 12, 2007

8.5/10

p. People criticised the camerawork, but I felt it suited the film, and really helped involve you in the action. Need to re-watch the first two to determine if it’s as good/better than the first two. Regardless, I really enjoyed it. And actually got to go out to a cinema to see it! OMG.
